summary:
UPDATE
I had completely forgotten about this mod, and it seems people are having trouble with the cooldown being removed. It is not necessary for the mod to function, I had changed that in testing and forgotten to change it back. If anyone still has interest in a fixed version please leave a comment!

Removes the brightening e
descriptionHtml: This will remove the screen effect that's shown when the Slow Time shout is used.
author: Lestat Viro
